remarks: An alternate representation of a successor aleph.  The aleph function is the function obtained from the ~ hartogs function by transfinite recursion, starting from ` _om ` .  Using this theorem we could define the aleph function with ` { z e. On | z ~<_ x } ` in place of ` |^| { z e. On | x ~< z } ` in ~ df-aleph .  (Contributed by NM, 3-Nov-2003.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Feb-2013.)
statement:
alephsuc2 $p |- ( A e. On -> ( aleph ` suc A ) = { x e. On | x ~<_ ( aleph ` A ) } ) $.
$d A x $.
